Contact} > Email LinkedIn GitHub Bio} > CV Highlights} > openHighlight('Autonomous Agricultural Robot') }>Master's Thesis Solar RPA English PLC Dobot setSubmenuHovered('academics')} onMouseOut={()=>setSubmenuHovered(null)} > Academics
} > setSubmenuHovered('professional')} onMouseOut={()=>setSubmenuHovered(false)} > Professional } > Skills} > ) }
